info.title: BorderpatrolAuthApi
info.description:
This is an API that requires the user to be authenticated with Auth0.
The API has an endpoint for myProfile that provides access to the user profile and which clients and api endpoints the user has access to.

To access myprofile, the user must have access to scopet borderpatrol-userprofile: read.
There is no access control for the applications and applications / configuration endpoint.
To access roles for an application, the user must have scoped borderpatrol applications: read

200.description: OK response with myProfilePermissionResponse returned when user profile is found. If no profile is found a empty list of permissions are retuned.

401.description: Unauthorized - is returned when accessing the endpoint without any auth token in header.

500.description: Internal Server Error is returned when an unhandled error occured.

get.description:
Endpoint that lists the users permissions based on the Auth0 token. 
If no profile or permissions are found, then empty list of permissions are returned.

getPermissionResponse.title: GetMyProfilePermissionResponse
getPermissionResponse.description:
Response for MyProfilePermissionResponse returns profile name and list of roles that profile has access to.
List of roles is an array of MyProfileRoleModel.
